description: Mobile techniques mitigated by Lock Bootloader, ATT&CK mitigation M1003 (v1.0)
name: Lock Bootloader (M1003)

techniques.comment: A locked bootloader could prevent unauthorized modifications to protected operating system files.
A locked bootloader could prevent unauthorized modifications of protected operating system files.
Users should ensure bootloaders are locked to prevent arbitrary operating system code from being flashed onto the device.
